description: A list of Amazon EC2 instances, belonging to all accounts, running on the specified Outpost. Does not include Amazon EBS or Amazon S3 instances.

parameters.name: AssetIdFilter
parameters.description: Filters the results by asset ID. (string) ---

parameters.name: InstanceTypeFilter
parameters.description: Filters the results by instance ID. (string) ---

parameters.name: AccountIdFilter
parameters.description: Filters the results by account ID. (string) --- The ID of the Amazon Web Services account.

parameters.name: AwsServiceFilter
parameters.description: Filters the results by Amazon Web Services service. (string) ---

nested_items.name: AssetInstances
nested_items.description: List of instances owned by all accounts on the Outpost. Does not include Amazon EBS or Amazon S3 instances.

nested_items.name: AssetId
nested_items.description: The ID of the asset. An Outpost asset can be a single server within an Outposts rack or an Outposts server configuration.

nested_items.name: AccountId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Amazon Web Services account.

nested_items.name: AwsServiceName
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services service name of the instance.
